name: Blink (itch) (Thomas Worrell)
description:
Blink is a prototype which entails a range of new physics I wanted to experiment with, feel free to play through, I'd love to hear your feedback, for games in the future and/or further development of this game (this depends on the public opinion though).

Currently you can swap between 1st and 3rd person perspectives via the "V" key. The rest of the controls are self explanatory. 

The game mechanic I wanted to experiment with was: if you move your range of vision decreases, if you stop it grows. This makes the game tactical, and adds an extra twist to the game.

Many thanks, hope find the game enjoyable! Have Fun!
